firstModXP:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
firstModXP:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

firstModXP:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
firstModXP:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
firstModXP:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

firstModXP:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
firstModXP:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

firstModXP:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
firstModXP:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !firstModXP:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

firstModXP:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
firstModXP:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !firstModXP:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
